|brand = Broadcom |model = BCM943142 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = HM |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = November 10, 2011 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Broadcom_BCM943142HM |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = (half)
|vendor_id = 14e4 |device_id = 4365 |subvendor_id = 17aa |subdevice_id = 0611 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = QDS-BRCM1063,QDS-BRCM1063H |icid = 4324A-BRCM1063 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43142; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/09/2011 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Wi-Fi Direct support, Bluetooth 4.0 + HS, PCIe + USB (BT)
The PCI ID is most likely 14e4:4365.
This device may be used in the following devices... * [[Lenovo]] Thinkpad Edge E130, E330, E430, E430c, E530 [http://download.lenovo.com/ibmdl/pub/pc/pccbbs/mobiles_pdf/0b48434_03.pdf] * [[Lenovo]] Thinkpad S430 [http://download.lenovo.com/ibmdl/pub/pc/pccbbs/mobiles_pdf/0b48434_03.pdf] * [[Lenovo]] Thinkpad T430u [http://download.lenovo.com/ibmdl/pub/pc/pccbbs/mobiles_pdf/0b48434_03.pdf] * [[Lenovo]] V580C - 14E4:4365, 17AA:0611 :PCI\VEN_14E4&DEV_4365&SUBSYS_061117AA
[[Category:English Documentation]]
